body.name: TDIFFUN Women's Shapewear Tank Tops Tummy Control Seamless Ribbed Square Neck Compression Body Shaper Top

asinVariationValues.variationValue: XS/S (firm control or one size up)
M/L (firm control or one size up)
XL/2XL (firm control or one size up)

features: 【SEAMLESS & HIGH-ELASTIC】90% Nylon + 10% Elastane, skin-friendly, breathable, and soft. Unique seamless fabric, more elastic, can better fit the waist and abdomen, and achieve a shaping effect. The women's shapewear tank tops are very flattering to wear.

【SHAPE WAIST & TUMMY CONTROL】This body shaper tops provide multi-directional support for easy abdominal, back and waist control. The midsection of the compression tank tops features a unique waist stitching craft that helps smooth your abdomen and outline the perfect body curve. The control of the shapewear starts from the area below the bust. No compression your chest.

【RIBBED FABRIC & NO ROLLING】Widened hem to avoid rolling up with body movement. Thick enough, no see through, perfect for outerwear and more stylish, and can be used as the base for all outfits such as tops, coats, shorts, jeans and skirts and more.

【SQUARE NECK SHAPEWEAR】The square-neck design of the shapewear is very slim, which can elongate the neck line very well. It has achieved a good balance between sexy and elegant, which is a must-have for your daily wardrobe. The compression shaper features two high elastic wide shoulder straps for a comfortable fit without pressure on the shoulders.
【WEAR & CARE TIPS】Shapewear are designed to be firm control, so you are supposed to gently pulled the bottom up like a skirt. Please refer to the picture for more details. MACHINE WASHABLE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does not shape
reviews.reviewText: Material does not shape as described

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart, minimal design and perfect for yoga or workout
reviews.reviewText: I like this top for yoga as the seamless fabric fits tight and offers some support while still feeling light and breathable. The design is minimal and flattering on many different body types. The long length is another good (and possibly underrated) feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit like a dream!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these.. the reviews said to size up. I was Leary but went with 3X... opened the package up. First glance.. uhh, these are small, and short.. and reviews also said they are longer than any others (a positive for me) tried it on.. they streatchhhhhh a lot but definitely have holding power. And the length is longer. Just doesn't look like it when you first open. I 100% recommend this product!!!TDIFFUN Women's 3 Piece Shapewear

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are a nice quality material that washes well. Tank straps are a bit long and not adjustable so I do have to keep pulling them up depending my shirt.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great! Definitely not as square necked as the listing photo, but very cute. I feel like they fall into the wearing underwear as outerwear category, but that’s pretty much the vibe these days so ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ you can definitely see my bra lines (and nursing pads and nips 😂) but let me live my lyyyyyife!! So for hanging out, working out, or running errands they are super cute. They usually give me a super defined waist too! I was surprised at how much they did! Honestly better than other shapewear I have, and I didn’t even buy these as shapewear but more for a tank top. Also, the width of the strap on the outside really helps with that obnoxious armpit squish area, so great all around 🙌🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. I ordered a bit larger for my size. Have had compression that compressed too much and caused back pain. When I tried these on they were SO CUTE and pretty that I wanted them to wear under my tops and sweaters for a base or just a top in summer. They look so expensive and classy. Like a very high-end top. I have a 4-year degree and this doesn't look like the price tag if that helps anyone gauge what types of clothes I choose. I didn't show cleavage on me but I didn't size it that way and that isn't how i wear my clothes. They are kind of thick which is why I like these tops so much. Some might not like that for exercise. I don't think I would wear this top necessarily for gym wear, just because they look too nice. I don't typically wear thick square neck cream-colored tops to the gym in the area where I live. It is more of an old t-shirt culture here. But not to say some places aren't like that. Who knows. Very happy. I would have ordered more but the color/size combo was sold out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Body Shapers Too Tiny
reviews.reviewText: The material quality of the body shaper was very high. The fit was impossible for me. I would have needed a 12XXL. I could not stretch it to fit over my head. The price for 3 is outstanding. Sorry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Itchy on ribbed section
reviews.reviewText: Overall, it's not a bad shaper and does well. Gives a nice silhouette and definitely good compression. My separated stomach muscles felt very supported in this. My heavy breasts felt supported also which was shocking because the shoulder straps are too large. It didn't create skin/fat rolls spilling out the top which happens in some shapers so that's great but also a bit of a negative because:The top was a little too large and the bottom is very small. 😂 It's like the M/L size is literally the bottom is Medium (or small, hello compression) and the top is a Large. The shoulder straps are actually too big on me and that's one of the reasons I'm returning it.I'm a 32-34DD, 160 lbs, and 5'2" with petite shoulders, a little waist, and wide hips with thicc thighs. I'm also super short waisted.This compression tank was very long on me, went down passed my booty. Could be a good thing if it had a sticky edge at the bottom to keep it in place.The ribbed section is itchy and I don't usually order anything ribbed because it always feels itchy to me so I may have missed that part when I ordered this and that is not necessarily an issue with the product but my own sensitivities.The bottom rolls up when you sit. This could be because it's too long on my shirt body. There is no sticky edge to hold it down so just be aware of that. It does seem to stay in place if you're standing and walking around.With my shorter and smaller natural waist, it bunched up there a lot. Not a problem with the product really but if you're curvy with a small waist, or are also short waisted like I am, it could be an issue for you too. I don't know which reason it bunches right there.
Bonne compression. Assez longues pour bien tenir dans le pantalon, ce qui évite de rouler sur les hanches.
This tank top feels like butter! Thick, high quality and beautiful. It’s is tight AF but once it’s on and it smooths you out, you feel like a million bucks!! I’m buying all the colours!

I ordered a size XS/S. I'm 5'4 and 140 pounds, my waist is 34 inches, c-cup. The shirts fit well, and provide a smoothing effect to my love handles and belly. The shirts are comfortable enough to wear all day. The compression effect is strongest at the small point of the waist, the top and bottom provide a more generous stretch for the hips and breast. Doesn't pinch into the armpits like I was worried it would! I feel like the compression could be a little tighter around the belly, but all in all the shirts are definitely worth the price
Wish they also had a long sleeve version. I accidentally ordered xs/s…yet the tank still does not roll and still fits well.
I usually fit a medium, but after reading comments, I ordered the Large to 2XL. They are still quite tight!
